content: I completely agree with you. involving local musicians in archaeological music research would be a fantastic way to learn about their music, culture, and traditions while fostering a collaborative relationship. by working together, researchers can gain valuable insights into the music's cultural significance and nuances, which may be difficult to capture through other means. collaborating with local musicians also provides an opportunity to create new music pieces that honor and showcase the existing musical traditions while exploring new possibilities. this exchange can result in cross-cultural musical experiences that contribute significantly to cultural exchange and understanding.
